attributes.action: stop pet shops from selling livestock. Make up an authority teamed up with animal charities to sell or rehome animals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are so many animals in the country waiting to be rehomed. People making impulse buys in a pet shop only inflames the situation as very often the animal becomes a chore and is tossed aside. 
It would make more sense if there was a regulated authority which, alongside UK animal charities, rehomed animals which are unwanted and worked with registered breeders to sell young animals to serious potential owners.
